data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 30,762 believers in the state of Duarte to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Duarte, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Duarte a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Duarte, Dominican Republic to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Duarte, Dominican Republic a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Japanese people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, teach the church in the state of Duarte to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 235,422 cultural Christians in the state of Duarte to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 30,762 believers in Duarte, Dominican Republic a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Duarte
location.cities_list: San Francisco de Macorís, Las Guáranas, Pimentel, Castillo, Villa Riva
